Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Waterfront Way, through the market area.
Room.LongDescription: On the north, you can make out an alchemy shop which appears to be venting some blue smoke from its roof. Another entrance is on Main Street, which is just east of here. On the south, you can see portions of Leonardo's Foundry, where nearly any metal can be melded into swords, armors, shields and anything else you can possibly think of. The entrance to the Foundry is also on Main Street.
